function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term operation of UV-C system without proper maintenance and regulation","Impact":"Increased risk of diminished UV-C performance and reduced effectiveness in controlling contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and regulation of the UV-C system according to manufacturer's guidelines","Technologies":"UV-C system with adjustable ballast and amalgam technology","People":"Occupants of the built environment, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inaccurate regulation of UV-C system power output","Impact":"Inconsistent UV-C radiation output leading to ineffective control of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of controllable high-frequency ballast and regular monitoring of UV-C system performance","Technologies":"Controllable high-frequency ballast, UV-C system with constant radiation output","People":"Facility management, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Failure to monitor UV-C system operating hours and power output","Impact":"Risk of reduced UV-C effectiveness and energy efficiency over time","Mitigation":"Implement automated monitoring system for UV-C system operating hours and power output","Technologies":"Automated monitoring system, UV-C system with adjustable ballast and amalgam technology","People":"Facility management, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance staff"}]}
